title: Is Every Sin the Same in God’s Eyes?
author: Kevin DeYoung
dc:creator: Kevin DeYoung
description: As much as it shows admirable humility or apologetic concern, we must not act or teach as if every sin is the same in God’s eyes.
content:encoded: As much as it shows admirable humility or apologetic concern, we must not act or teach as if every sin is the same in God’s eyes.
